channel.title: Where do i add

item.title: Where do i add
item.dc:creator: @The_roy6 The roy6
item.description:
@The_roy6 wrote:

Where would i add these?
They are tables that give money and thieving exp

[code]case 4463:
if(actionTimer == 6) {
addSkillXP(15000, 17);
addItem(995, 500000);
sendMessage(“You Steal 500k”);
}
break;

case 4462:
if(actionTimer == 6) {
addSkillXP(15000, 17);
addItem(995, 750000);
sendMessage(“You Steal 750k”);
}
break;

case 4460:
if(actionTimer == 6) {
addSkillXP(15000, 17);
addItem(995, 1000000);
sendMessage(“You Steal 1m”);
}
break;[/code]

Read full topic
